sourcesContent:
import { Location } from '@angular/common'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ExpenseService } from 'src/app/services/expense.service'; import { GroupService } from 'src/app/services/group.service'; import { distributionTypesEnumMappings as distributionTypesEnumMappings } from '../enum'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-expense', templateUrl: './create-expense.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-expense.component.css'], }) export class CreateExpenseComponent implements OnInit { createGroupForm = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), payerId: new FormControl(-1, [Validators.required, Validators.min(0)]), groupId: new FormControl(-1, [Validators.min(0), Validators.required]), amount: new FormControl('', Validators.required), currency: new FormControl('', Validators.required), category: new FormControl('', Validators.required), distributionType: new FormControl('', Validators.required), description: new FormControl(''), userIds: new FormControl( [], [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(1)] ), }); groupId!: number; categories!: string[]; distributionTypes!: string[]; currencies!: string[]; groupMembers!: { id: number; username: string }[]; selectedGroupMembers: number[] = []; memberProportions: { [groupMemberId: number]: number } = {}; constructor( private expenseService: ExpenseService, private groupService: GroupService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.expenseService.getExpenseCategories().subscribe((result) => { this.categories = result; console.log(this.categories); }); const groupId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.groupId = parseInt(groupId!); const groupIdControl = this.createGroupForm.get('groupId'); if (groupIdControl !== null) { groupIdControl.setValue(this.groupId); } const memberControls: any = {}; this.groupService.getGroupMembers(this.groupId).subscribe((result) => { this.groupMembers = result; //ahány groupmember van, annyi percentes formcontrolt hozok létre és hozzáadom a formgroupomhoz this.groupMembers.forEach((member) => { this.createGroupForm.addControl( memberControls[member.id], new FormControl('') ); }); }); this.expenseService.getCurrencies().subscribe((result) => { this.currencies = result; }); this.expenseService.getExpenseDistributions().subscribe((result) => { this.distributionTypes = result; console.log(this.distributionTypes); }); } toggleSelection(userId: number) { if (this.selectedGroupMembers.includes(userId)) { this.selectedGroupMembers = this.selectedGroupMembers.filter( (item) => item !== userId ); } else { this.selectedGroupMembers.push(userId); } this.createGroupForm.get('userIds')?.setValue(this.selectedGroupMembers); console.log('this.selectedGroupMembers: ', this.selectedGroupMembers); } updateProportions(id: number, percent: number) { if (percent > 0) { this.memberProportions[id] = percent; } else { delete this.memberProportions[id]; } console.log('memberProportions: ', this.memberProportions); } isChecked(id: number) { return this.selectedGroupMembers.find((userId) => userId === id) ? true : false; } goBack() { this.router.navigate(['/groupdetails', this.groupId]); } submitForm(): void { // console.log(this.createGroupForm.value); this.expenseService .createExpense(this.createGroupForm.value) .subscribe(() => { this.router.navigate(['/groupdetails', this.groupId]); }); } get name() { return this.createGroupForm.get('name'); } get currency() { return this.createGroupForm.get('currency'); } get amount() { return this.createGroupForm.get('amount'); } get payerId() { return this.createGroupForm.get('payerId'); } get category() { return this.createGroupForm.get('category'); } get distributionType() { return this.createGroupForm.get('distributionType'); } get userIds() { return this.createGroupForm.get('userIds'); } }

Name is required.
Amount is required.
Currency is required.
Category is required.
